Text:
joey from seinfield is in this one
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2300923/

An irreverent yet charming sportscaster who, after a loss, finds solace from members of his mandatory group therapy sessions.
How is this available? Isn't it supposed to air next fall?
Nope, ran on NBC at 11 PM tonight. Couldn't see it in my area because the cable crapped out.

@BlackandBad: "joey from seinfield is in this one" -- what the fuck are you on about?
First of all, there is no Joey in "Seinfeld" (not "Seinfield"). There was a Joey in "Friends", but that's Matt Le Blanc who now stars in "Episodes", which is a different show from this one. There was however a Chandler in Friends, played by Matthew Perry. HE is in this one.
To all who are wondering...This was a pilot...Now the actual season of this show starts tuesday sept 11th
